subject: ECONOMIC  AND FINANCIAL CRIM
body:
ECONOMIC  AND FINANCIAL CRIMES COMMISSION
 Office of the Economic and Financial Crime Commission's 
  Wuse zone 11 (fct), abuja nigeria,
   Motto: security watch
 Our ref: ng-gw-efcc-as-005-31.
 =========================.
 
ATTN:  
This is to acknowledge the receipt of your mail, from the Economic And Financial Crimes Commission , I am directed to inform you that your payment verification and confirmations has been confirmed valid. Therefore, we are happy to inform you that arrangements have been concluded to effect your payment as soon as possible and in our bid to transparency.
 
It is my pleasure to inform you that your ATM Card Number is; 7482 9522 6412, have been approved in your favor. Your Personal Identification Number Code (ATM Pin Code) is 3399 and you can as well change it immediately as soon as you get the Atm Card. The ATM Card Value is $10,700,000.00 USD Only. You are advised that a maximum withdrawal value of $2,500 USD is permitted on withdrawal at a time. Your ATM Card is an "Inter Switch ATM Card, and this means that you can make withdrawal in any ATM location and ATM Center of your choice anywhere in the world. But your withdrawal limit still remains TWO THOUSAND FIVE HUNDRED UNITED STATES DOLLARS AT EACH WITHDRAW, or it's equivalent in your local currency.
 
To enable us release your ATM Card to you, we have concluded delivery arrangement with FEDEX COURIER SERVICES NIGERIA, because they are affilated to one of the Largest Insurance Companies here in Nigeria, "Nicon Insurance Corporation". You ATM Card has been insured by Nicon Insurance Corporation, incase of loss of theft. Please understand that these are standard procedures in order to ensure transparency.
 
In view of this development, you are requested to choose from the options listed below, as the listed options for delivery were the best gotten from the fedex Courier Services. All options covers insurance, so make a choice and get back to us with the option that you have chosen from the list below. Please take time to pick a choice, from the under listed:
 
GSCS GOLD (2 DAYS DELIVERY)
Mailing $100.00 00 .00
Insurance $50.00 00.00
Vat (5%) $20.00 00.00
TOTAL $170 usd.
 
GSCS SILVER ( 3 DAYS DELIVERY)
Mailing $ 80.00  00.00
Insurance $ 50.00 00.00
Vat (5%) $ 20.00 00.00
TOTAL $150 usd.
 
GSCS BRONZ (4 DAYS DELIVERY)
Mailing $70.00  00.00
Insurance $ 50.00 00.00
Vat (5%) $ 20.00 00.00
TOTAL $140 usd.
 
 
Select a delivery option, so that we can provide you with details of how you are to expedite payment. As soon as we confirm receipt of your payment, your ATM Card will leave the FEDEX COURIER SERVICES office, for your location.
 
 
The FEDEX COURIER SERVICES will provide you with your "tracking number" which will enable you know the exact date and time of delivery to the address you provided to us.
 
NOTE that you are not to disclose this ATM notice to any body for security reason and for the double claiming of card.
 
Once again we say a big Congratulation, to you as this world will be a better place to live in the next 20 to 25 years, with poverty eradicated by then.
Due to some security reasons i can send my work id.
 
We deeply appreciate your co-operation and understanding.
 
Your communication code: EFCC/NG/74-a04072023GN/NG/LAG.
 
I expect your prompt response
 
Regards,
Mr. Ola Olukoyede
Executive Chairman,
Economic and Financial Crimes Commission.

subject: Re:   ECONOMIC  AND FINANCIAL CRIM
body:
Commission

Dear Mr. Ola Olukoyede,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my payment. I appreciate the update and the efforts being made to ensure a smooth transaction. I understand the importance of security measures in such matters.

I have a few questions before I proceed with selecting a delivery option. Firstly, could you please provide more information about the GSCS Gold, Silver, and Bronze Days Delivery options? What are the differences between them in terms of mailing, insurance, VAT, and total cost?

Additionally, I would like to know how long it usually takes for the delivery to be made once the payment is confirmed. Is there any way to track the progress of the delivery online?

Lastly, you mentioned that my ATM Card has been insured by Nicon Insurance in case of loss or theft. Could you please provide more details about this insurance coverage? What does it cover exactly?

Thank you once again for your assistance. I look forward to your prompt response.

Best wishes,
Pauline
